web_snippets: Daniel Lidar is the holder of the Viterbi Professorship of Engineering at the University of Southern California and researches quantum information processing.
Daniel Lidar. Article · Talk. Language ... University of Southern California, where he is a professor of electrical engineering, chemistry, physics & astronomy.
Daniel Lidar is a Professor of Electrical Engineering and Chemistry at USC, where he has been since July '05. He also holds a cross appointment in Physics.
